shows.title: Ocean Conservation / ETs & Akashic Records
shows.first_half: Capt. Paul Watson, co-founder of Greenpeace, discussed the critical state of the world's oceans. Followed by ET contactee Debbie Solaris on the "cosmic" Akashic Records and her interactions with alien beings.

shows.title: Beliefs About God / Tarot & Aleister Crowley
shows.first_half: First Half: Author Micah Dank will explore the significance of God in contemporary society. He will examine the wide range of global beliefs and consider why religion continues to spark widespread interest.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Esoteric writer Lon Milo DuQuette will discuss his two latest works, "The Tarot Architect" and "Young Aleister Crowley & The Magicians' Revolt." The first is a culmination of his 55-year relationship with Tarot, and the second is based on real historical characters from young Crowley’s life at the time of his tumultuous involvement with the magicians of the Hermetic Order of the Golden Dawn.

shows.title: Psychic Detective / Curses & Demons
shows.first_half: First Half: Pam Coronado, a psychic detective, remote viewer, and spiritual teacher, has spent over twenty years assisting law enforcement, search teams, and families with missing-person investigations. She will recount her direct experiences in cases involving mysterious circumstances.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Ray Scott, a practitioner of metaphysics and mind science, will share his research and experience in removing demons, protecting against curses, and countering spirit invasions affecting individuals, businesses, and property. He’ll also address methods for healing the harm caused by these unwanted entities.

shows.title: Healing from Trauma / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Joining guest host Connie Willis (info), former Chicago police officer Kameryn Rein Schwarz will speak about how she started the Center for Restorative Healing after witnessing countless traumatic deaths and humanity at its worst. She had reached her breaking point and will share her story and explain how her life was saved. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Connie a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
